an Open offer, escrows the collateral on the contract and sends the nft to the borrower.","params":{"collateral":"how much collateral the borrowers wants to add to the offer.","offerId":"the id of the offer."}},"addCollateral(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Adds extra collateral to the position of the borrower.","params":{"extraCollateral":"how much extra collateral the borrowers wants to add to the offer.","offerId":"the id of the offer."}},"cancelOffer(uint256)":{"details":"Cancels open offer and returns the nft to the owner.","params":{"offerId":"the id of the offer."}},"changeFee(uint256)":{"details":"Changes the fee ","params":{"newFee":"new fee."}},"changeLiquidationFee(uint256)":{"details":"Changes the liquidation fee","params":{"newLiquidationFee":"new liquidation fee."}},"createOffer(uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Opens a new Offer, and sends the nft to an escrow.","params":{"fee":"fee amount that accumulates every 24 hours.","liquidation":"if the amount of liquidation+accumulatedFee is bigger than the collateral, the borrower is liquidated.","nftAddress":"address of the nft to offer.","nftId":"id of the nft to offer."}},"getOffer(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the details for a offer.","params":{"offerId":"The id of the offer."}},"getOfferQuantities()":{"details":"Returns the number of offers made."},"getOffersOfAddress(address)":{"details":"Returns all offers of an address.","params":{"addr":"the address to lookup."}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"liquidate(uint256)":{"details":"Liquidates the borrower if he owns more than he has collateral.","params":{"offerId":"the id of the offer."}},"onERC721Received(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}. Always returns `IERC721Receiver.onERC721Received.selector`."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`."},"repayOffer(uint256)":{"details":"checks if borrower is liquidated or not, then transfers the nft to the contract,  pays the lender, pays the protocol and finally returns the rest of the collateral to the borrower","params":{"offerId":"the id of the offer."}},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role."},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"transferPayoutAddress(address)":{"details":"Changes account to send payout.","params":{"newPayout":"new address to send payout."}}},"title":"ERC721Lending","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"notice":"ERC721 Lending plataform where users that documentation.text:
@dev Liquidates the borrower if he owns more than he has collateral.
 @param offerId the id of the offer.

@dev Changes account to send payout.
 @param newPayout new address to send payout.

@dev Changes the fee 
 @param newFee new fee.

@dev Changes the liquidation fee
 @param newLiquidationFee new liquidation fee.

acceptOffer(uint256,uint256).details: Accepts an Open offer, escrows the collateral on the contract and sends the nft to the borrower.

params.collateral: how much collateral the borrowers wants to add to the offer.

addCollateral(uint256,uint256).details: Adds extra collateral to the position of the borrower.

params.extraCollateral: how much extra collateral the borrowers wants to add to the offer.

cancelOffer(uint256).details: Cancels open offer and returns the nft to the owner.

createOffer(uint256,address,uint256,uint.details: Opens a new Offer, and sends the nft to an escrow.

params.fee: fee amount that accumulates every 24 hours.
params.liquidation: if the amount of liquidation+accumulatedFee is bigger than the collateral, the borrower is liquidated.
params.nftAddress: address of the nft to offer.
params.nftId: id of the nft to offer.

getOffer(uint256).details: Returns the details for a offer.

getOfferQuantities().details: Returns the number of offers made.

getOffersOfAddress(address).details: Returns all offers of an address.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

liquidate(uint256).details: Liquidates the borrower if he owns more than he has collateral.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

repayOffer(uint256).details: checks if borrower is liquidated or not, then transfers the nft to the contract,  pays the lender, pays the protocol and finally returns the rest of the collateral to the borrower

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

userdoc.notice: ERC721 Lending plataform where users that provide the ERC721 token set a liquidation limit and fee, and users that borrow the ERC721 token set how much collateral they add to the transaction
